"*50% off select original and regular-priced apparel, accessories, fine jewelry and home purchases of $40 or more. 65% off select original and regular-priced apparel, accessories, fine jewelry and home purchases of $100 or more. Extra 25% off select original and regular-priced women?s footwear, handbags, Haggar, Lee, men?s workwear, watches, electrics/electronics, storage & organization, custom blinds and shades, kitchen and dining, accent furniture, mattresses and floor care. Extra 25% off select sale and clearance-priced apparel, shoes, accessories, fine jewelry and home purchases. Each offer good at jcp.com only, excluding taxes and shipping charges, 6/26/17-6/28/17. One use per coupon, one coupon per customer; must be provided/surrendered at time of purchase. Dollar-off offers (including JCPenney Rewards) applied prior to companywide percent-off discounts or coupons.  

Original and regular-priced offers do not apply to BOGO?s, sale or clearance-priced items; all offers do not apply to Low Price Everyday, Best Value, Levi?s, Bras, Men?s and Kid?s Underwear and Socks, Disney Collection, Disney Tsum Tsum, Fisher-Price, Licensed Team Sports Merchandise, Branded Athletic Apparel, Columbia, Nike, adidas, Converse, Athletic Shoes, Men?s and Kid?s Shoes, Original and Regular-Priced Skechers, Journee Collection, Keds/Grasshoppers, Flexxus, Spring Step, NurseMates, Earth Origins, City Streets, Dockers, Jewelry Trunk Shows, Modern Bride Diamond Vault, Fashion Jewelry, Sale and Clearance-Priced Watches, Citizen Quartz, Garmin, Sephora, Food, Penney Lane, Sale and Clearance-Priced Electrics/Electronics, Appliances, KitchenAid, NuWave, NutriBullet, Tristar, Smart Home, As Seen On TV, Travel Accessories, Hunter Douglas, Tempur-Pedic, Sale and Clearance-Priced Floor Care, Home D?cor, Fitness Equipment and Accessories, Sporting Goods and Outdoor, Pet Care, Toys, Baby Furniture, Baby Gear, Personalized Jewelry, Wigs and Extensions, Limited Time Specials, Purchase with Purchase Items, In-Store Services, Home Services, Service Plans, Gift Cards, Furniture Outlet purchases, Closing Store Purchases, current orders and prior purchases, or in combination with other coupon(s). 

Free Shipping valid  @offerStartDate - @offerEndDate at jcp.com only: Applies to standard delivery (4-7 business days) on select online purchases with online code to a home, office, dorm anywhere within the United States or its territories, or to a JCPenney store. You will be contacted when your order arrives in store. Free shipping offers do not apply to large/heavy items delivered via truck.

Shipping Surcharges: To ensure your order reaches you safely, additional shipping charges may apply to some heavy or bulky items due to size, weight or special handling required. These additional shipping fees will be noted below the price of the item on the product page and at checkout. 

INSTRUCTIONS FOR JCP.COM ORDERS: Enter online code 22BUYNOW when prompted at checkout or call 1.800.322.1189 and mention the code.   "

Dollar-off offers (including JCPenney Rewards) applied prior to companywide percent-off discounts or coupons.  

Original and regular-priced offers do not apply to BOGO?s, sale or clearance-priced items; all offers do not apply to Low Price Everyday, Best Value, Levi?s, Bras, Men?s and Kid?s Underwear and Socks, Disney Collection, Disney Tsum Tsum, Fisher-Price, Licensed Team Sports Merchandise, Branded Athletic Apparel, Columbia, Nike, adidas, Converse, Athletic Shoes, Men?s and Kid?s Shoes, Original and Regular-Priced Skechers, Journee Collection, Keds/Grasshoppers, Flexxus, Spring Step, NurseMates, Earth Origins, City Streets, Dockers, Jewelry Trunk Shows, Modern Bride Diamond Vault, Fashion Jewelry, Sale and Clearance-Priced Watches, Citizen Quartz, Garmin, Sephora, Food, Penney Lane, Sale and Clearance-Priced Electrics/Electronics, Appliances, KitchenAid, NuWave, NutriBullet, Tristar, Smart Home, As Seen On TV, Travel Accessories, Hunter Douglas, Tempur-Pedic, Sale and Clearance-Priced Floor Care, Home D?cor, Fitness Equipment and Accessories, Sporting Goods and Outdoor, Pet Care, Toys, Baby Furniture, Baby Gear, Personalized Jewelry, Wigs and Extensions, Limited Time Specials, Purchase with Purchase Items, In-Store Services, Home Services, Service Plans, Gift Cards, Furniture Outlet purchases, Closing Store Purchases, current orders and prior purchases, or in combination with other coupon(s). 

Free Shipping valid  06-26-2017 12:00AM - 07-31-2017 11:00PM at jcp.com only: Applies to standard delivery (4-7 business days) on select online purchases with online code to a home, office, dorm anywhere within the United States or its territories, or to a JCPenney store. You will be contacted when your order arrives in store. Free shipping offers do not apply to large/heavy items delivered via truck.

Shipping Surcharges: To ensure your order reaches you safely, additional shipping charges may apply to some heavy or bulky items due to size, weight or special handling required. These additional shipping fees will be noted below the price of the item on the product page and at checkout. 

INSTRUCTIONS FOR JCP.COM ORDERS: Enter online code 22BUYNOW when prompted at checkout or call 1.800.322.1189 and mention the code.   "
